mapper.sql: id , role_id, auth_group_id, creator, created, remark
mapper.select:
select rg.id as id, rg.role_id as roleId, rg.auth_group_id as authGroupId, ag.group_name as authGroupName, rg.creator as creator, rg.created as created, rg.remark as remark from role_to_auth_group rg join auth_group ag on rg.auth_group_id = ag.id where rg.role_id = #{param.roleId}
and ag.group_name like concat('%',#{param.authGroupName},'%')
